learningPaths.description: This mandatory phase builds the foundational skills for using Claude effectively. It focuses on mastering the art of communication, prompt engineering, and understanding the tool's core capabilities, including file handling.

modules.objective: Understand Claude's models, learn to navigate the interface, and master the art of crafting clear, effective prompts.

lessons.lessonName: Getting Started: Understanding Claude's Models (Haiku, Sonnet, Opus) and Navigating the Web Interface
Crafting Effective Prompts: Writing Clear, Specific Requests, Providing Context, and Asking Effective Questions
Mastering Multi-Turn Conversations: Building Context, Maintaining Thread Continuity, and Asking Follow-up Questions
Core Capabilities: Using Claude for Explanation, Summarization, and Basic Code/Writing Tasks

modules.moduleName: Module 1.2: Applied Prompt Engineering & File Handling
modules.objective: Move from basic prompts to advanced techniques, including file uploads, few-shot examples, and structured reasoning.

lessons.lessonName: Advanced Prompt Structure: Providing Few-Shot Examples, Setting Constraints, and Defining Desired Output Formats
Mastering File Uploads: Analyzing Single and Multiple Documents, Code Files, and Images
Chain-of-Thought Prompting: Guiding Claude Through Complex, Step-by-Step Reasoning for Better Problem-Solving
Ethical and Responsible Use: Understanding Limitations, Verifying Information, and Protecting Sensitive Data

learningPaths.pathName: Path A: The Technical Professional (Developer, DevOps, Architect)
learningPaths.description: A specialized path for technical users focused on using Claude for coding, debugging, system design, and integrating with AWS and Bedrock.

modules.objective: Use Claude to accelerate the entire development lifecycle, from writing code and tests to debugging and refactoring.

lessons.lessonName: Code Generation and Refactoring: Using Claude to Generate Functions, Modernize Patterns, and Simplify Complex Code
Code Review and Debugging: Uploading Code Files to Find Bugs, Analyze Stack Traces, and Suggest Improvements
Testing Strategy and Test Case Generation: Prompting Claude to Develop Testing Strategies and Create Comprehensive Unit/Integration Tests

modules.objective: Leverage Claude as a design partner to plan complex systems, APIs, and identify technical debt.

lessons.lessonName: Architecture Design and Planning: Using Claude to Brainstorm System Architectures, Select Components, and Plan Large Projects
API Design and Documentation: Prompting Claude to Design RESTful API Endpoints and Generate Clear API Documentation
Technical Debt, Security, and Performance Analysis: Using Claude to Identify Vulnerabilities, Bottlenecks, and Tech Debt

modules.moduleName: Module 2.3: AWS Architecture & Planning with Claude
modules.objective: Use Claude as an expert assistant for designing, optimizing, and troubleshooting AWS infrastructure.

lessons.lessonName: AWS Architecture Design: Using Claude to Design Scalable AWS Architectures and Select the Right Services (e.g., Lambda, S3, DynamoDB)
Infrastructure as Code Assistance: Generating and Optimizing CloudFormation and Terraform Code with Claude
AWS Troubleshooting and Optimization: Diagnosing AWS Errors and Planning Cost/Performance Optimization Strategies

modules.objective: Use Claude to plan and architect applications that integrate with AWS Bedrock, including RAG and Agent-based systems.

lessons.lessonName: Bedrock Architecture Design: Using Claude to Design Bedrock-Based Applications, Select Models, and Plan Workflows
RAG System Design: Prompting Claude to Design a Complete Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) System Architecture
Bedrock Agent and Knowledge Base Design: Using Claude to Plan Bedrock Agents and Document Processing for Knowledge Bases
Optimizing Bedrock Applications: Using Claude to Brainstorm Cost and Performance Optimization Strategies for Bedrock

learningPaths.pathName: Path B: The Business & Research Professional (Analyst, Strategist, Writer)
learningPaths.description: A specialized path for non-technical or business-focused users. This path emphasizes research, data analysis, strategic planning, and advanced content creation.

modules.objective: Leverage Claude as a powerful research assistant to analyze data, synthesize documents, and perform complex analysis.

lessons.lessonName: Data Interpretation and Insight Generation: Using Claude to Analyze Data, Find Patterns, and Generate Actionable Insights
Comprehensive Document Analysis: Extracting Key Information, Summarizing Multiple Documents, and Synthesizing Themes
Comparative and Competitive Analysis: Using Claude to Compare Options, Technologies, and Competitor Strategies
Policy and Regulation Analysis: Using Claude to Interpret and Summarize Complex Policies, Regulations, and Compliance Requirements

modules.objective: Use Claude as a strategic partner to develop business plans, manage projects, and optimize internal processes.

lessons.lessonName: Business Plan and Strategy Development: Prompting Claude to Help Create Business Plans, Strategy Documents, and Growth Plans
Project Planning and Management: Using Claude to Plan Project Milestones, Identify Risks, and Develop Management Strategies
Process Improvement and Workflow Design: Analyzing Existing Processes and Prompting Claude to Design Optimized Workflows

modules.objective: Master Claude for creating high-quality, long-form content, developing marketing strategies, and defining a brand voice.

lessons.lessonName: Technical Writing and Explanation: Creating Clear Technical Documentation, Guides, and Tutorials for Complex Topics
Marketing Strategy and Campaign Development: Using Claude to Brainstorm Marketing Strategies, Campaigns, and Content Calendars
Brand Voice and Messaging: Developing a Consistent Brand Voice, Message Frameworks, and Communication Guidelines
Presentation and Pitch Development: Using Claude to Create Compelling Narratives, Structures, and Talking Points for Presentations

learningPaths.description: This mastery-level path is for leaders, managers, and architects responsible for scaling Claude across an organization using Claude Teams and enterprise-grade architecture.

modules.objective: Learn to set up, manage, and use Claude Teams for secure, effective organizational collaboration.

lessons.lessonName: Claude Teams Setup and Management: Creating a Team, Managing Members, and Configuring Workspace Settings
Team Collaboration Workflows: Using Shared Workspaces, Sharing Conversations, and Collaborating on Projects
Team Knowledge Management: Building a Shared Organizational Knowledge Base and Documenting Best Practices within Claude Teams

modules.objective: Establish the policies, standards, and training programs needed to scale Claude responsibly and effectively.

lessons.lessonName: Creating Custom Instructions for Teams: Establishing Team-Level Standards, Personas, and Guidelines for Consistent Outputs
Establishing Team Governance and Standards: Creating Usage Guidelines, Compliance Policies, and Cost Governance Plans
Building Team Expertise: Developing Training Programs and Mentoring Strategies to Scale Claude Adoption Across the Organization

modules.objective: For technical leaders: Plan and design robust, secure, and scalable enterprise-wide integrations with the Claude API, AWS, and Bedrock.

lessons.lessonName: Enterprise Claude API Integration: Architecting Large-Scale, Secure, and Scalable Integrations with the Claude API
Advanced AWS Enterprise Architecture: Using Claude to Design Multi-Account, Multi-Region, and Disaster Recovery Strategies
Enterprise Bedrock Deployment: Using Claude to Plan Scalable, Governed, and Responsible AI Deployments with Bedrock
Enterprise Security and Compliance: Implementing Security, Governance, and Compliance for Claude, AWS, and Bedrock
